nameMeaning.title: I am <name>Sehee Jang</name>, a developer who bestows joy upon the world.
nameMeaning.description: My name, “Jang Sehee,” carries the meaning of generously bestowing joy across the world. Through development, I aspire—true to my name—to bring small delights and profound happiness to many.

prologue.ending: This journey is not mine alone. Are you ready to share joy together?

ch1.title: Why Joy?
ch1.question: Is a developer just someone who writes code? Or someone who creates experiences?

keywords.creative: Even a simple button can bring joy.
keywords.interactive: Data becomes more fun when it moves.
keywords.storytelling: A project should be a story, not just a function.

ch2.title: The Process of Realizing Joy
ch2.problem: At the starting point of a dull journey, the problems were clear.
ch2.approach: I designed each step of the user’s journey with joy.
ch2.result: Both operations and experiences have become more joyful.

ch3.title: The Traces of Joy
ch3.metrics: Change is proven both in numbers and in emotions.
ch3.feedback: People’s joy is the true result.
ch3.impact: Joy extends not only to users but also to the entire team.

ep.title: Where will the next journey to spread joy to the world be?
ep.message: Is there a place where you want to spread joy? I would love to join you on that journey.
ep.signature: Sehee Jang – A developer who spreads joy to the world
